Text.Page:
They must use this device to regulate the butterflies...to usher them out of the nest. Whoever thought of this, it's diabolical.

I'm starting to worry about what might be deeper inside...

A butterfly queen? Some monstrous machine?

Or something even less comprehensible to our minds?

Injecting giant butterflies with stimulants...

No one is going to believe me when I tell this story...
